"Raskina": "Looks like you've arrived there. Alright, so just like how you choose a class, try choosing a Sub Class."
"Your Main Class will be able to use the skills and techniques of your Sub Class, so..."
"With that in mind, try picking one!"
"Well, actually, there are some exceptions, but you don't have to worry about that right now."
"Being able to freely mix and match classes is one of your special privileges as a member of ARKS, so make use of it to your heart's content!"
